name: Prime Galaxy
description:
Here's an awesome Space Shooter I made to upload on Play Store... Before I found out that that requires a $25 registration fee. (That's not quite so little in my country) So I'm uploading it here instead! Hopefully, I'll make enough from here to be able to register. Please consider donating to help me reach my goal.

Prime Galaxy is a cool modern space shooter with challenging levels, engaging gameplay, ship customization, an endless mode, and much more. Upgrade your ship to defeat the enemies, change the color theme of your ship and lasers to fit your mood, and more.
